channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Many Afghans living in the U.S. fear being tortured or killed if they get deported
item.description: Roughly 200,000 Afghans came to the U.S. after the Taliban seized control in Afghanistan in 2021. Many are worried about their future as President Tru...

item.title: Word of the Week: Before the Birdman of Alcatraz, the island was known for its birds
item.description: The origin story of Alcatraz's name is a complicated mix of language, a history that dates back to the first Europeans to explore the coast of Califor...

item.title: SCOTUS upholds Trump's transgender military ban. And, the papal conclave begins
item.description: The Supreme Court has allowed the Trump Administration to start executing its ban on trans military service members. And, the conclave to elect the Ca...

item.title: Here's the 2025 list of Most Endangered Historic Places in the U.S.
item.description: This year, the annual list from the National Trust for Historic Preservation includes a mysterious castle, flooded communities in Florida and North Ca...

item.title: The Fed will likely hold interest rates steady as Trump's tariffs spark uncertainty
item.description: The Federal Reserve will likely hold interest rates steady Wednesday as President Trump's tariffs threaten to raise prices and drag down economic grow...

item.title: Utah judge to decide if convicted killer with dementia can be executed
Indian air strikes - how will Pakistan respond? Four key questions
item.description: Experts from India and Pakistan weigh in on what’s next - and how this clash differs from past conflicts.

item.title: Most travelers must have a REAL ID now to fly within the US
item.description: REAL ID requirements for those flying within the United States begin after more than 20 years of delays.

item.title: Thorny issues await the new pope, and the men about to choose him

item.title: Here's how cuts at NIH could impact cancer patients
item.description: The Trump administration's cuts to the National Institutes of Health has some worried about stalls in research and medicine.

item.title: Trump appeasing Putin with pressure on Ukraine, Biden tells BBC
item.description: In his first interview since leaving office, the 82-year-old criticises his successor's handling of the war and is challenged on his own record.

item.title: What we know about India's strike on Pakistan and Pakistan-administered Kashmir
item.description: India launched strikes in the early hours of Wednesday - two weeks after a deadly militant attack.

item.title: Lawmakers seek to rein in citizen ballot initiatives with new requirements for petitions
LGBTQ Catholics hope for continued inclusion under new pope
item.description: Pope Francis, who died at 88 last month, was the first pontiff to be publicly inclusive of the LGBTQ Catholic community.

item.title: Gang who smuggled thousands of queen ants sentenced in Kenya
item.description: The four suspects – two Belgians, a Vietnamese and a Kenyan – were arrested last month with 5,000 ants.

item.title: AI chatbot "Debunk-Bot" challenges conspiracy theories in new study

item.title: 'Why would we play Putin's game?': Ukrainians see Russian lull as sideshow
item.description: Russia is expected to begin a self-declared three-day pause in fighting against Ukraine on Wednesday night.

item.title: Cardinals convene for 2025 conclave to choose Pope Francis' successor
item.description: The Catholic Church's cardinal electors are set to choose a successor to Pope Francis, as the 2025 papal conclave begins.
